MAIN_MESSAGE: It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown for safety at 4:25AM in the SY10 postcode area of Oswestry following reports of a grounded overhead line. This may affect the supply to your property.  Our engineers are on their way to the local area and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6:30AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:24AM on 11th March 2021.
